text:
Example:

``` python
from nilearn import datasets
from nilearn import plotting

icbm = datasets.fetch_icbm152_2009()
icbm_gm = icbm['gm']
plotting.plot_roi(icbm_gm)
```

Any hints to solve this bug ?
